question: The Peoples Temple of the Disciples of Christ (Peoples Temple) was an American new religious organization which existed between 1954 and 1978. Which of the following is it's branch country other than the United State of America?
explanation: The Peoples Temple of the Disciples of Christ (Peoples Temple) was an American new religious organization which existed between 1954 and 1978. Guyana was its branch country other than the United State of America. Originally founded in Indianapolis, Indiana, the USA, by Reverend Jim Jones, the Peoples Temple spread a message that combined elements of Christianity with communist and socialist ideology, with an emphasis on racial equality.
